Load wehoop women's college basketball team box scores

Source: R/wbb_pbp.R
load_wbb_team_box.Rd

helper that loads multiple seasons from the data repo either into memory or writes it into a db using some forwarded arguments in the dots

load_wbb_team_box(
  seasons = most_recent_wbb_season(),
  ...,
  dbConnection = NULL,
  tablename = NULL
)

Arguments

seasons

A vector of 4-digit years associated with given women's college basketball seasons. (Min: 2006)

...

Additional arguments passed to an underlying function that writes the season data into a database (used by update_wbb_db()).

dbConnection

A DBIConnection object, as returned by DBI::dbConnect()

tablename

The name of the play by play data table within the database

Value

Returns a tibble

Examples

# \donttest{
load_wbb_team_box(2021)
#> # A tibble: 7,494 × 41
#>    team_short_display_name team_uid team_alternate_… team_color team_display_na…
